entry.title: Open Design Engine - Bug #102: Updates to the repository don't show up on "Activity" tab automatically
entry.content:
• Assignee set to J. Simmons

Thank you for the feedback. I think I know why this is happening, and will be looking into how to address it as soon as I resolve a couple of other issues.

entry.title: Open Design Engine - Bug #102: Updates to the repository don't show up on "Activity" tab automatically
entry.content:
• Subject changed from Updates to the repository don't show up on "Activity" tab automatically to Updates to the repository don't show up on "Activity" tab automatically
  • Target version changed from v0.2.1 - Public Beta Enhancements to v0.3 - Sustainability Enhancements
